resources.string:
You may compare asteroid size with size of Ceres.
Also you may check how far is asteroid in compare to distance between Earth and Sun.

P.S. In most cases asteroid size is too small, so You'll need to zoom out to find Ceres

Add the asteroid to favorites, and you will receive notifications about its approach. You may also set the minimum time interval that the program will consider for an asteroid to travel to Earth before it is considered as approaching
You may compare the characteristics of asteroids that added to favorite
